snippet: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes has been fined 8,000 pounds by the Football Association after a coat-throwing touchline tantrum during his side's 5-1 English Premier League defeat at Newcastle United....

headline.print_headline: Hughes Fined by FA Over Touchline Tantrum
headline.main: Hughes Fined by FA Over Touchline Tantrum

lead_paragraph: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes has been fined 8,000 pounds by the Football Association after a coat-throwing touchline tantrum during his side's 5-1 English Premier League defeat at Newcastle United.
